entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Rain along parts of the coast this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 5.
